pma:database.name: calendator
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `punchlist` ( `linkid` varchar(36) NOT NULL, `title` int(11) NOT NULL, `description` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `project` varchar(36) DEFAULT NULL, `feature` varchar(36) DEFAULT NULL, `tasks` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`tasks`)), `features_multi` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `projects_multi` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `flags` bit(16) DEFAULT NULL, `x_1` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`x_1`)), `x_2` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`x_2`)), `x_3` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`x_3`)), `x_4` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`x_4`)), `x_5` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`x_5`)), PRIMARY KEY (`linkid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;
